description:
Masako comes to visit the Takakura home while Shouma and Kanba are out, and prepares to fire a `remembrance` bullet at Himari just as Kanba and Shouma return home to stop her - but the event still causes Himari to begin to remember the truth buried deep inside her memory.
The next morning, the three are once again eating breakfast together as if nothing had happened, but when Himari mentions that Shouma`s miso soup tastes just like their mother`s, the two brothers sink into silence...
Source: Official Site

titles.title: 選んでくれてありがとう
